summary:
Player home in Whiterun behind Breezehome.
male / female mannequins
many weapon racks
blacksmith
2 guest Bedrooms
1 master bedroom
pool-area
secret entrance from outside of whiterun
descriptionHtml:
- Player home in Whiterun behind Breezehome.
Kitchen							(800) gold
Food, cooking station, open fire ...
Alchemy and Enchantment				(2000) gold
Alchemy station and enchanter with some soul stones and various storage options
Potions and skill books 					(5000) gold
34 strong Potions and skill-books:
-	1 hand weapons
-	2 hand weapons
-	lockpicking
-	enchanting
-	destruction
-	conjuration
… and a spellbook for a teleportspell for the 7 Dragons Manor
Mannequins 						(1000) gold
6 male and 3 female mannequins
Blacksmith						(1000) gold
Blacksmith, smelter, tanning rack, storage space …
Bedroom upgrade					(800) gold
Bedrooms can be embellished
Pool area						(2000) gold
Pool and 1 more female mannequin
The pool is functional and has 4 seats 4 switchable showers and a jacuzzi function
2Guestrooms						(2000) gold
2 Guest Rooms with beds and some equipment
author: dignityblade
